subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=38|rad=女|as=04|sn=7|four=41410|canj=VPP|ids=⿰女比}}

# a [[posthumous]] name for [[mother]]s
#* The ''[[w:Book of Rites|Book of Rites]]'', Qu Li II, 122:
#*: 生曰父、曰母、曰妻，死曰考、曰'''妣'''、曰嬪。
#*: ''While alive, the names of '[[父|father]]', '[[母|mother]]', and '[[妻|wife]]' are used; when they are dead, those of '[[考|the completed one]]', ''''the corresponding one'''', and '[[嬪|the honored one]]'.''
